Definition: Leads the yearbook’s overall vision; ensuring the theme and narrative align across all sections.
Assists the chief editor in shaping the yearbook’s storyline and coordinating content flow.
Manages editorial deadlines and ensures cohesive storytelling across sections.
Oversees the yearbook’s visual design; from color schemes to layout aesthetics.
Tracks production schedules and ensures timely completion of tasks.
Coordinates content creation; ensuring all sections reflect the yearbook’s theme.
Edits the sports section; capturing game highlights and athlete profiles.
Curates the academics section; highlighting achievements and classroom moments.
Manages the clubs section; showcasing extracurricular activities and events.
Edits the senior class section; crafting memorable profiles and tributes.
Oversees the arts section; highlighting student creativity and performances.
Edits the student life section; documenting candid moments and traditions.
Writes compelling headlines that grab attention and summarize stories.
Crafts concise; evocative captions for photos and graphics.
Writes feature stories that bring depth to the yearbook’s narrative.
Collects and curates student quotes to add authentic voices to the publication.
Creates short sidebars or supplemental content to enrich pages with fun facts.
Edits copy for clarity; grammar; and consistency across the yearbook.
Verifies facts and details in stories to ensure accuracy.
Designs layouts that balance text; images; and white space for visual impact.
Selects and applies typography styles to enhance readability and aesthetic.
Chooses color schemes that align with the yearbook’s theme and mood.
Ensures visual flow across pages; creating a cohesive look.
Creates infographics to present data in engaging; visual formats.
Weaves the yearbook’s theme into layouts and supplemental content.
Leads photography efforts; capturing high-quality images for the yearbook.
Specializes in candid photography; capturing spontaneous student moments.
Takes professional portraits for student and staff profiles.
Photographs action shots; like sports or performances; for dynamic spreads.
Edits photos for clarity; color; and impact; enhancing visual storytelling.
Captures full-bleed photos that extend beyond page margins for bold impact.
Archives and organizes photos for easy access during production.
Creates and analyzes student polls to include in the yearbook.
Coordinates superlatives; ensuring creative and inclusive categories.
Researches and writes trivia or fun facts for supplemental content.
Creates social media tie-ins to promote the yearbook online.
Curates throwback content; like past yearbook references or historical photos.
Manages yearbook distribution to students and staff.
Promotes the yearbook through marketing campaigns and announcements.
Oversees the budget; tracking expenses and fundraising efforts.
Provides tech support for design software and production tools.
Proofreads final layouts to catch last-minute mistakes.
Edits digital images to ensure consistency with the yearbook’s aesthetic.
Captures creative; experimental photos to add flair to spreads.
Designs layouts with a poetic balance of elements for visual harmony.
Writes witty; concise captions that complement images perfectly.
Ensures the yearbook’s theme is consistently reflected in all content.
Mentors photographers on composition and storytelling through images.
Refines color palettes to evoke specific emotions in each section.
Writes versatile stories that adapt to various yearbook sections.
Manages photo selection and placement for maximum impact.

Creates bold; innovative layouts that push design boundaries.

Organizes content to ensure balanced storytelling across pages.

Captures unguarded moments that reflect authentic student life.
Highlights graduating class achievements with memorable content.

Organizes content to create a lasting; nostalgic keepsake.
Ensures the yearbook captures the school’s unique culture and spirit.
Uses lighting techniques to enhance photo quality and mood.
Guides the photography team in capturing meaningful moments.
